name: Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 17: Phantasy Star Generation:2
synopsis: Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 17: Phantasy Star Generation 2 is the seventeenth entry in the Sega Ages 2500 series for the PS2. Similarly to the [[Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 01: Phantasy Star: Generation:1]], this game is a modern remake of Phantasy Star II including new graphics, sounds and gameplay. Also included an emulated version of the Mega Drive Phantasy Star II.
